name: afvvdm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)), wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)))

|- wi(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe), wn(wcel(cafv(c0, c1), c2)))

comment: If the function value of a class for an argument is a set, the argument is contained in the domain of the class. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)
